g.text: Performance: O(n¬≤) algorithm in user search function
Suggest binary search or indexed lookup ‚Ä¢ Impact: High ‚Ä¢ Confidence: 95%
Code Style: Inconsistent naming convention in new components
Follow PascalCase for components ‚Ä¢ Impact: Medium ‚Ä¢ Confidence: 87%
Learning Opportunity: Advanced React patterns implementation
Great use of custom hooks ‚Ä¢ Share with junior developers ‚Ä¢ Document pattern
Overall Quality Score: 8.2/10 (+0.5 from previous review) ‚Ä¢ Estimated review time: 12 minutes
Pattern Recognition: Advanced React Hooks Implementation
‚Ä¢ Custom hook pattern shows excellent separation of concerns
‚Ä¢ Document this pattern for team wiki ‚Ä¢ Share in next tech talk

svg.title: Context-Aware Review Assistant Interface - AI-Powered Code Review Enhancement
svg.desc: Interactive review assistant interface showing real-time analysis pipeline, context-aware recommendations, automated quality checks, and learning opportunities. Demonstrates AI-enhanced code review with 127ms response time, 94% accuracy, and intelligent suggestion generation for improved review quality and team learning.
